channel.title: Michael Gilroy
channel.description: Let's build something cool together. Here, I showcase things you may want to see, such as my resume, social media outlets, and projects that are in the works. I'm an aspiring software engineer, but my expertise is in systems administration and network engineering.

item.title: Project 3
item.description: This website was made by yours truly! Check out the GitHub repository! This is hosted on Git Pages and created using the Jekyll static site generator.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: For my Intro to Programming class, I decided to make an application for stock analysis in Python. Simply enter a stock symbol (i.e. "TSLA") and let it do its thing! I'm looking to expand functionality by adding Robinhood trading functionality via their API, and add more to customize the output to the user's liking.

item.title: Project 1
item.description: Check out my resume!! It's up to date and ready for your viewing.
